page.title: 16PRIORY ROAD POLICE STATION.
page.content: {Priory Road Police Station}is a small one . It is a prefabricated building and has only one level. The station opened in 1974 and is the headquarters of one of the ten sub-divisions which make up{Humberside Police Force.}There are about 130 officers stationed here in about fifty rooms, including a C.I.D. section,five cells, a canteen, a social club, petrol pumps and a car wash. About twenty five vehicles are attached to the station. All the printing for Humberside Police is done here and all the uniforms are kept here, there is a mobile fitting room. {Sergeant Johnson}told us that the major problems facing the station were policing{Hull City and Hull Rugby {League}club's grounds and{Hull Fair.} {Burglaries}are another serious problem.
